#### About me

I’m an Economics PhD student at Universidad de los Andes. My primary interests are Public Policy, Illegal Markets and Urban Economics. I’m also interested in Applied Econometrics, Big Data, and Machine Learning.

I will be in the Economics Job Markets in 2022-2023. You can find my CV <a href="https://eduard-martinez.github.io/cv/CV-Eduard_F_Martinez_G.pdf">here</a>
and my Job Market Paper <a href="https://eduard-martinez.github.io/cv/CV-Eduard_F_Martinez_G.pdf">here</a>.
